metadata.name: CobaltStrike Load by Rundll32
metadata.comment: Rundll32 can be use by Cobalt Strike with StartW function to load DLLs from the command line.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\rundll32.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('rundll32.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('rundll32.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('rundll32 '))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dll')) AND (endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' startw')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(',startw'))))

output.summary: Rundll32 can be use by Cobalt Strike with StartW function to load DLLs from the command line.
